description: Provided academic support in teaching advanced mathematics, including calculus, algebra, dynamics, statics, and analytical geometry, to high school students.
Helped students build confidence in problem-solving by simplifying complex concepts and encouraging active engagement.
Participated in Research Day at TCCD - Cairo University, presenting a project on the application of partial differential equations (PDE) in modeling body fluid dynamics.
The work explored innovative mathematical models to understand cardiovascular behavior and advance biomedical engineering solutions.
Represented the Taqaddam program to promote youth leadership, teamwork, and life skills development.
Assisted in workshops and events that empowered students to step out of their comfort zones, build confidence, and find creative solutions to real-world challenges.
Worked as part of the Operation Room team for the ‘Youth Leading Youth’ initiative, created by the Ministry of Youth and Sports.
Organized and coordinated events and programs in collaboration with various ministries and government entities, ensuring smooth execution and effective communication.
Organized and managed sports events and activities, including ELFIT, one of the region’s most prominent fitness competitions.
Played a key role in planning, coordination, and ensuring seamless execution, delivering high-quality experiences for participants and audiences.
Trained swimmers of varying skill levels with a focus on refining techniques, improving performance, and preparing for competitive tournaments.
Designed personalized training programs to enhance endurance, speed, and precision while fostering discipline and confidence.
Trained and guided individuals in parachuting techniques at Al Galaa Club, focusing on safety, precision, and confidence-building.
Supervised jumps and ensured participants were well-prepared for every step of the experience.
